005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
009
010import java.util.HashMap;
011import java.util.Map;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015/**
016 * Provides a basic configuration management implementation that allows mutable
017 * access to configuration state.
018 *
019 * @param <T>
020 *          the type of managed features
021 */
022public class DefaultConfiguration<T extends IConfigurationFeature<?>>
023    implements IMutableConfiguration<T> {
024  @NonNull
025  private Map<T, Object> featureValues;
026
027  /**
028   * Create a new configuration.
029   *
030   */
031  public DefaultConfiguration() {
032    this.featureValues = new HashMap<>();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Create a new configuration based on the provided feature value map.
037   *
038   * @param featureValues
039   *          the set of enabled features
040   */
041  public DefaultConfiguration(@NonNull Map<T, Object> featureValues) {
042    this.featureValues = new HashMap<>(featureValues);
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Create a new configuration based on the provided configuration.
047   *
048   * @param original
049   *          the original configuration
050   */
051  public DefaultConfiguration(@NonNull DefaultConfiguration<T> original) {
052    this(original.getFeatureValues());
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  public Map<T, Object> getFeatureValues() {
057    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(featureValues);
058  }
059
060  private void ensureBooleanValue(@NonNull T feature) {
061    Class<?> valueClass = feature.getValueClass();
062    if (!Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(valueClass)) {
063      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
064          String.format("Feature value class '%s' is boolean valued.", valueClass.getName()));
065    }
066  }
067
068  @Override
069  public boolean isFeatureEnabled(@NonNull T feature) {
070    ensureBooleanValue(feature);
071    return get(feature);
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public IMutableConfiguration<T> enableFeature(@NonNull T feature) {
076    ensureBooleanValue(feature);
077    featureValues.put(feature, true);
078    return this;
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public IMutableConfiguration<T> disableFeature(@NonNull T feature) {
083    ensureBooleanValue(feature);
084    featureValues.put(feature, false);
085    return this;
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public IMutableConfiguration<T> applyConfiguration(@NonNull IConfiguration<T> original) {
090    this.featureValues.putAll(original.getFeatureValues());
091    return this;
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  public IMutableConfiguration<T> set(T feature, Object value) {
096    Class<?> featureValueClass = feature.getValueClass();
097    Class<?> valueClass = value.getClass();
098    if (!featureValueClass.isAssignableFrom(valueClass)) {
099      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
100          String.format("Provided value of class '%s' is not assignment compatible with feature value class '%s'.",
101              valueClass.getName(),
102              featureValueClass.getName()));
103    }
104    featureValues.put(feature, value);
105    return this;
106  }
107}
